database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS Streptomyces cinnamonensis extract
entry.description: Streptomyces cinnamonensis (producer of monensin) grown on solid R5 media. Extracted after 7 days in 50:50 butanol/ethyl acetate. Dissolved in 50:50 ACN/water and analyzed by UPLC-MS
